text: Aduna eikhoina ngangba matamda mioibagi lousingna tambiba waheina ngangde, adubu Thawai aduna tambiba waheina, thawaigi oiba hiramsing adubu Thawai adu leiba makhoising2:13 “Thawai adu leiba makhoi” asi “thawaigi oiba wa” haina lairik kharada handok-i. aduda sandokna takpibada eikhoina ngang-i.
